data.title: Houston Rockets Roster
data.meta_description: Houston Rockets scores, news, schedule, players, stats, rumors, depth charts and more on RealGM.com
data.text:
Aaron Brooks was selected as the #26 pick in the First Round of the 2007 NBA Draft by the Houston Rockets. Aaron Brooks signed a multi-year contract with the Houston Rockets on July 7, 2007.

Yao Ming was selected as the #1 pick in the First Round of the 2002 NBA Draft by the Houston Rockets. Yao Ming signed a multi-year contract with the Houston Rockets on October 8, 2002. Yao Ming signed a multi-year extension with the Houston Rockets on August 31, 2005.

Draft Rights to Joey Dorsey, the #3 pick in the Second Round of the 2008 NBA Draft, were acquired by the Houston Rockets from the Portland Trail Blazers on June 26, 2008. Joey Dorsey signed a multi-year contract with the Houston Rockets on September 29, 2008.

Draft Rights to Carl Landry, the #1 pick in the Second Round of the 2007 NBA Draft, were acquired by the Houston Rockets from the Seattle SuperSonics on June 28, 2007. Carl Landry signed a contract with the Houston Rockets on October 2, 2007. Carl Landry re-signed to a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Houston Rockets on October 9, 2008.

Draft Rights to Luis Scola, the #27 pick in the Second Round of the 2002 NBA Draft, were acquired by the Houston Rockets from the San Antonio Spurs on July 12, 2007. Luis Scola signed a multi-year contract with the Houston Rockets on July 14, 2007.

Shane Battier was acquired in a trade by the Houston Rockets from the Memphis Grizzlies on July 12, 2006.

Brian Cook was acquired in a trade by the Houston Rockets from the Orlando Magic on February 19, 2009.

Kyle Lowry was acquired in a trade by the Houston Rockets from the Memphis Grizzlies on February 19, 2009.

Tracy McGrady was acquired in a trade by the Houston Rockets from the Orlando Magic on June 28, 2004. Tracy McGrady signed a multi-year extension with the Houston Rockets on November 1, 2004.

Dikembe Mutombo was acquired in a trade by the Houston Rockets from the Chicago Bulls on September 8, 2004. Dikembe Mutombo re-signed to a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Houston Rockets on August 26, 2005. Dikembe Mutombo re-signed to a contract as a free agent with the Houston Rockets on October 1, 2007. Dikembe Mutombo re-signed to a contract as a free agent with the Houston Rockets on December 31, 2008.

Metta World Peace was acquired in a trade by the Houston Rockets from the Sacramento Kings on August 14, 2008.

Brent Barry signed a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Houston Rockets on July 10, 2008.

Chuck Hayes signed a contract with the Houston Rockets on January 18, 2006. Chuck Hayes re-signed to a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Houston Rockets on January 28, 2006. Chuck Hayes re-signed to a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Houston Rockets on August 3, 2007.

Von Wafer signed a contract as a free agent with the Houston Rockets on September 29, 2008.

James White signed a contract with the Houston Rockets on March 3, 2009. James White re-signed to a contract as a free agent with the Houston Rockets on March 13, 2009. James White re-signed to a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Houston Rockets on March 23, 2009.
